channel.title: How to Dupe!
channel.description:
Hey everybody! I'm posting a topic on here that I hope people will add on to: how to dupe! Everybody post their source OR server and write how you can dupe on it! I'll start: Delta: 1. Trade your friend 2. Put up the item you want to dupe 3. Both accept the first trade screen 4. Person who offered the item: spam accept trade alot then click decline really fast 5. Trade the other player three times 6. Say done 7. Person who is recieving the item: when you hear done accept the trade 8. When you see trade accepted in the chat box, log out 9. When you log in you both will have the items!
SOME Hybrid pvp sources: Go through the trade and accept everything. Person who gave the item click somehwere else on the minimap really quickly when the second screen is accepted. You both have the items.

item.title: How to Dupe!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Chaos Owner Chaos
item.description:
@Owner_Chaos wrote:

Hey everybody! I’m posting a topic on here that I hope people will add on to: how to dupe! Everybody post their source OR server and write how you can dupe on it! I’ll start:
Delta:

  1. Trade your friend
  2. Put up the item you want to dupe
  3. Both accept the first trade screen
  4. Person who offered the item: spam accept trade alot then click decline really fast
  5. Trade the other player three times
  6. Say done
  7. Person who is recieving the item: when you hear done accept the trade
  8. When you see trade accepted in the chat box, log out
  9. When you log in you both will have the items!

SOME Hybrid pvp sources:
Go through the trade and accept everything.
Person who gave the item click somehwere else on the minimap really quickly when the second screen is accepted. You both have the items.

Read full topic
